mapper.select: SELECT app_consignee_id as appConsigneeId, user_id AS userId, consignee_name AS consigneeName, consignee_mobile AS consigneeMobile, address AS address, is_default AS isDefault, create_time AS createTime, active AS active, longitude AS longitude, latitude AS latitude FROM app_consignee WHERE app_consignee_id=#{consigneeId}
